##### President Obama Asks Medvedev for ‘Space’ on Missile Defense — ‘After My Election I Have More Flexibility’
Shocker… Despite Obama’s Policy of Appeasement – Medvedez Says They Will Target US Missile Defense Sites
A recent government report found that Russia’s military intelligence was responsible for a bomb blast that occurred at an exterior wall of the U.S. Embassy in Tbilisi, Georgia, in September, 2010
Russia Pushes Restart Button… Test Fires Two New Nuke Missiles
Putin praises Cold War moles for stealing U.S. nuclear Secrets
How's that 'reset' button working?
